title: Thai sweet sticky rice with mango (Khao neeo mamuang)
ingredients: ['300g uncooked short-grain white rice', '475ml water', '350ml coconut milk', '200g caster sugar', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '125ml coconut milk', '1 tablespoon caster sugar', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon tapioca starch or cornflour', '3 mangos, peeled and sliced', '1 tablespoon toasted sesame seeds']
